subclusters.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
Dietary Restriction and Nutrient Sensing Theories

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: This theory focuses on the IIS pathway as a conserved regulator of aging via DAF-2 receptor and DAF-16/FoxO transcription factor.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IIS pathway as a master regulator of aging with emphasis on DAF-2 and DAF-16/FOXO roles.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on FOXO transcription factors regulated by IIS and their role in lifespan extension.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details conserved IIS pathway effects on lifespan and metabolic health across species.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Examines IIS modulation in long-lived mammals, highlighting insulin responsiveness and FOXO involvement.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links reduced IIS to lifespan extension via Gnmt-dependent spermidine production and autophagy.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows FOXO/DAF-16 activation via neuromuscular acetylcholine receptor inhibition, connecting IIS to longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IIS reduction and DAF-16 activation as mechanisms for lifespan extension.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on isoform-specific roles of DAF-16/FoxO in mediating IIS-dependent longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains longevity via Pit1 mutation causing reduced IIS signaling in Snell dwarf mice.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Genetic control of longevity through IIS and DAF-16/FOXO regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IIS downregulation and FOXO activation during reproductive dormancy extending lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Covers conserved insulin/IGF signaling mechanisms linking metabolism, reproduction, and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on reduced IGF-1 signaling via rare variants promoting exceptional longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details DAF-16 regulation of natc-1 linking IIS to stress resistance and longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes reproductive system signals modulating lifespan via IIS and DAF-16.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows DAF-16/FoxO mediated repression of ribosomal protein genes enhancing stress resistance and longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Nutrient Sensing Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on dietary restriction mimetics activating AMPK and metabolic pathways influencing aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Nutrient Sensing Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes amino acid sensing via GCN2 and TOR pathways mediating dietary restriction effects on longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Nutrient Sensing Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Covers caloric restriction effects on longevity through modulation of insulin/IGF and mTOR pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Energy Trade-Off Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explores trade-offs between stress resistance, stored energy, and longevity reflecting resource allocation costs.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Energy Trade-Off Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses trade-offs between male fertility decline and indirect genetic benefits to offspring fitness.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Energy Trade-Off Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Classic disposable soma hypothesis emphasizing energy allocation trade-offs between reproduction and somatic maintenance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Energy Trade-Off Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Life-history trade-off between reproductive effort and longevity with genetic and phenotypic correlations.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Energy Trade-Off Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows cost of reproduction mediated by oxidative stress and pro-aging cellular mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Energy Trade-Off Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses resource allocation trade-offs shaping sex-dependent aging and longevity.
